about_the_game:
You are a newly hired cleaning worker at Canal 7. During your first night shift, you discover that the channel is hiding a secret studio, where a recently canceled television show was being recorded.

Suddenly, you find a strange puppet that clings to your arm and won't let you escape. Now, you must find a way to free yourself while discovering the secrets it hides, and how it is related to Canal 7.

Solve puzzles, learn about Canal 7's story

Uncover buried Canal 7's secrets, in a single player mascot horror experience. Read notes and files that never made it into the outside world and find out what really happened in this place.

                     

Carefully crafted

Immerse yourself in a carefully crafted hand made world, interact with a complex world full of small details.

You will have to solve puzzles and uncover mysteries in order to free yourself from the puppet, the catch is that, to free yourself you must worry about not waking it up or it could be the end for you.

                What is it hiding? What is it up to? Is it real? Is it alive? Is it good or is it bad?

                                              Can you free yourself from IT?

name: Puppet Project

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i-7 7700K
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 6600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Puppet Project is a horror game mainly inspired by the Chilean television show "31 Minutos" and other puppet shows. Somehow you have a strange and disturbing puppet stuck on your hand. You'll have to find a way to free yourself before something worse happens.
supported_languages:
Spanish - Latin America*, English
*languages with full audio support
